bio:
30 years experience designing instrumentation and control systems for an aerospace company's R&D Systems and Structures Test Lab. 

Bachelors Degree in Computer Science. 

Engineered data acquisition and control systems, test and measurement equipment, signal conditioning, telecommunications, telemetry, and flight test systems.
Custom design and modifications of software and hardware.
Arduino and PIC microcontrollers.
High speed video, lighting controls and audio design.
Lab View, C++, DasyLab and Visual Basic 
PCB layout with PCB Artist, Eagle and UltiBoard.
Experienced AutoCAD, SolidWorks, Sketchup and MicroStation user.
Schematic and PCB design of electronic instrumentation.
Perform spice simulation with Pspice, LTspice and Multisim.
Experience in test control, data acquisition and robotics.
Strain Gage Installations and Drawings.
Thermocouples, RTDs and Accelerometers.
Good working knowledge of machining, adhesives, materials, MIL/AN specs.  Environmental testing, geometric dimensioning and tolerance per ANSI Y14.5.
Experience in hardware troubleshooting, sensor design and system design.
Control panel and Motor Control Center design, PLC programming.
Variable frequency drives, DC drives, and AC motors.
Factory automation and industrial controls.
National Instruments, Baldor, Koyo, AB, Automation Direct.
Excellent manager of multiple projects, objectives and deadlines.
My work terms are negotiable.

abstrac: Café Web Website Design Service ~ Choose Your Flavor!
bio: My name is Celia Keehn, I am a stay-at-home mom, and I am a creative person. I love to work with people and have been in the customer service industry my whole working life. Then I realized that I could be my own boss and still work with people as well as help others by offering a low cost option to web design needs. I am new to this industry, but have done several projects including website designs, flyers, and website revamp projects. So far I have received nothing but positive feedback on my projects that I have completed thus far. I look forward to working on many more projects and helping people with their website design needs.

Monday - Friday 9:00a-4:00p / Saturday & Sunday CLOSED. 
(All hours subject to exceptions based on circumstance)

bio:
Madeline Northway is a commercial photographer, currently based out of Chicago. Madeline's photographic interests have taken a great focus on beauty, makeup and hair as a result of working in the beauty industry for 6+ years. While her passion is in the beauty & fashion industry, she absolutely loves all aspects of commercial photography.

Her current work, walking the line between commercial and editorial, strives to be clean and creative. She is experienced with both natural and studio lighting.

Photographing everything from fashion & beauty to special events, families & weddings with great technical skill and creative personality.

Madeline graduated from Columbia College Chicago with a BA degree in Commercial Photography and has been working as a freelance commercial photographer and fashion photographer since 2010.
Please email for for further pricing and booking information. I can't wait to work with you!
